name: Sendbird
headline: Omnichannel AI Agent Platform for Delightful Customer Service
description: At Sendbird, we are building the AI workforce of tomorrow. Our product is the world's most useful omnichannel AI agent platform for delightful customer service. We power over 300M+ people's conversations every month and we are working with the leading customers such as DoorDash, Match Group, Yahoo!, PayPal, Walgreens, and have raised $220M+ in total funding from ICONIQ, Tiger Global, Meritech, Emergence, SoftBank Vision Fund, Steadfast, Shasta, and August.

founders.description:
Co-Founder and CEO of SendBird (YC W16), the world's #1 conversations platform for mobile apps with 320M monthly active users. Previous startup Paprika Lab (social gaming) was acquired by GREE. Korea's all-time no.1 pro gaming champion in Unreal Tournament. B.S. computer science. Engineer who likes brain, space, complexity.

• Personal website: https://positivetenacity.com
• IG: https://www.instagram.com/dosh

generated_description:
### Sendbird: Transforming Customer Service with AI

Founded in **2013**, Sendbird hails from San Mateo, California, and kicked off its journey in the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W16. What sets Sendbird apart is its mission: to build an **Omnichannel AI Agent Platform for Delightful Customer Service**. Simply put, they aim to revolutionize how businesses interact with customers by leveraging cutting-edge AI technology.

### The Impact
Every month, Sendbird facilitates over **300 million** conversations, seamlessly connecting businesses with their customers across various channels. Notable clients include industry giants like **DoorDash, Yahoo!, PayPal,** and **Walgreens**, making it a trusted partner for customer engagement.

### Funding and Growth
To support its ambitious goals, Sendbird has attracted over **$220 million** in funding from high-profile investors such as SoftBank Vision Fund, Tiger Global, and ICONIQ Capital. With a nimble team of 300 employees, Sendbird's growth trajectory is nothing short of impressive.

### What They Offer
Sendbird specializes in creating an **AI workforce** that is intelligent, proactive, and always improving. Here’s a snapshot of what their platform brings to the table:
- **Omnichannel Support**: Whether it’s mobile, social media, or email, Sendbird’s AI agents operate seamlessly across platforms.
- **Continuous Conversations**: Customers can switch channels without losing the context, thanks to Sendbird’s smart conversation management.
- **Proactive Engagement**: The AI can anticipate customer needs and initiate conversations, enhancing user experience.
- **Unified Insights**: Sendbird provides businesses with a complete view of customer interactions, enabling data-driven decisions.

### Security First
In a world where data privacy is paramount, Sendbird emphasizes a secure platform built around stringent **privacy and compliance** measures. They ensure that customer data remains protected and confidential while integrating smoothly with existing systems.

### Support and Resources
Sendbird doesn't just stop at providing an AI platform; they also offer extensive support throughout the deployment process and beyond, ensuring that businesses can leverage AI effectively. Their focus on transparency means that companies can monitor and refine their AI agents to align with business goals.

### Ready to Engage?
If you’re interested in transforming your customer service experience with AI, Sendbird is eager to help. To learn more about their solutions or to get started, check out their website: [Sendbird](https://sendbird.com).

---

Sendbird isn’t just riding the AI wave; they're helping companies navigate through it with finesse. With a commitment to delightful service enabled by technology, they are undoubtedly paving the way for the future of customer interactions.
